import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./styles/TeacherTimetable.css"; export default function TeacherTimetable() { // Example timetable data const [timetable] = useState({ Monday: [ { time: "08:00 - 08:45", subject: "Mathematics", class: "8-A" }, { time: "08:45 - 09:30", subject: "Computer Science", class: "9-B" }, { time: "09:45 - 10:30", subject: "Physics", class: "10-A" }, { time: "10:30 - 11:15", subject: "Chemistry", class: "10-B" }, ], Tuesday: [ { time: "08:00 - 08:45", subject: "Computer Science", class: "9-A" }, { time: "08:45 - 09:30", subject: "Mathematics", class: "8-B" }, { time: "09:45 - 10:30", subject: "English", class: "9-C" }, { time: "10:30 - 11:15", subject: "Physics", class: "10-A" }, ], Wednesday: [ { time: "08:00 - 08:45", subject: "Mathematics", class: "8-A" }, { time: "08:45 - 09:30", subject: "Computer Science", class: "10-B" }, { time: "09:45 - 10:30", subject: "Chemistry", class: "9-A" }, { time: "10:30 - 11:15", subject: "Physics", class: "8-B" }, ], Thursday: [ { time: "08:00 - 08:45", subject: "Mathematics", class: "8-C" }, { time: "08:45 - 09:30", subject: "Computer Science", class: "9-A" }, { time: "09:45 - 10:30", subject: "Physics", class: "10-A" }, { time: "10:30 - 11:15", subject: "English", class: "9-C" }, ], Friday: [ { time: "08:00 - 08:45", subject: "Computer Science", class: "9-B" }, { time: "08:45 - 09:30", subject: "Chemistry", class: "10-A" }, { time: "09:45 - 10:30", subject: "Mathematics", class: "8-A" }, { time: "10:30 - 11:15", subject: "Physics", class: "9-B" }, ], Saturday: [ { time: "08:00 - 08:45", subject: "Computer Science", class: "8-A" }, { time: "08:45 - 09:30", subject: "Mathematics", class: "9-C" }, { time: "09:45 - 10:30", subject: "English", class: "10-B" }, { time: "10:30 - 11:15", subject: "Chemistry", class: "9-A" }, ], }); return (
